Product Information
Configure in

Otto S

Otto is a simple, multifunctional pouf. The pouf has a characteristic wooden base - a reference to the Giuseppe - and soft upholstery. You can customise Otto to your taste, so it will perfectly fit your sitting area. Choose from a wide range of fabrics and design your own pouf. Otto is available in two sizes.

  • The pouf is available in Standard upholstery and Kvadrat upholstery

  • The oak base of the pouf is available in hardwax oil natural, hardwax oil natural light, black lacquer or white lacquer

  • The pouf is available in small and large

 Read more
